comment: This HTML course is very informative and good. As well easy to understand.
Feel really thankful and enjoyable to have this amazing course. It provides me solid knowledge of JavaScript and also teaches me how to think like a developer. Thanks your team for great effort !
Great Course, i learned what i wanted to learn long time ago but i was afraid of being not unable to achieve it.
One of the best and most comprehensive course I have taken so far on game character design and creation. Gives me a solid foundation to build upon for further development.
A very interesting, exiting and helpfull course - thank you very much for it. It gives me a re new view to developing a web site.
I am happy to learn a lot of topics in this course. The thing which attracts the most is the way he explains every concept in this course and implement.
Really a great experience. My first course and it was such a pleasant journey. A lot of knowledge. Now, is up to me to practice!
Overall good, but I expected a bit more after learning from other gamedev.tv courses. Got what I came for (mobile specific stuff) and I'm happy with a purchase, but there's a room to improve.
I truly appreciate your teaching. I enjoyed every minute of your lecture. Thank you very much for the course.
One of the best and most comprehensive course I have taken so far on game character design and creation. Gives me a solid foundation to build upon for further development.
I took this course because I wanted to extend my skills from environment / props to characters. I enjoyed it very much and learned new techniques, while reinforced my core modeling skills.
Although there may be good practical examples in the course, it is lost in lengthy and meandering videos. I have found myself speeding up the video and skipping quite a few videos.
